hudson.tasks.Shell.command: cd $CHECKMATE_HOME export CHECKMATE_CLASSPATH=$TANGO_CLASSPATH export TANGO_DB_NAME=pytango_C2_runs export TANGO_HOST=localhost:10108 DataBaseds 2 -ORBendPoint giop:tcp::10108& python checkmate/nose_plugin/plugin.py --nocapture --with-checkmate --application=pytango.checkmate.application.Application --sut=C2 --runs=100 --random checkmate/ sample_app/
